local_intent: Open drawer_A after aligning and grasping its bar handle, then verify it is open.
assumptions: Handle is a bar type; yaw 90Â° is appropriate for alignment.
Perception may require a brief scan if the handle is not initially visible.
Targets 'drawer_handle' (perception/approach) and 'drawer_A' (container) refer to the same drawer assembly.
coherence_with_global: Mirrors the global sequence from handle detection through approach/alignment, grasp, OpenContainer(drawer), and verification via ContainerOpen with identical parameters and bounded retries.
